pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.flavorText: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.flavorText: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.flavorText: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

pokemon.name: Nidoran-f
pokemon.flavorText: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.flavorText: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.flavorText: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

pokemon.name: Nidoran-m
pokemon.flavorText: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.flavorText: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.flavorText: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.flavorText: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.flavorText: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.flavorText: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.flavorText: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.flavorText: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.flavorText: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.flavorText: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.flavorText: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.flavorText: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.flavorText: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.flavorText: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.flavorText: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.flavorText: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.flavorText: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.flavorText: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.flavorText: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
